column6: Still reeling from the shattering events in the first issue, Spider-Girl faces one of the strongest threats in the Marvel Universe, the RED HULK. But how can one teenage girl stop a menace that has the FANTASTIC FOUR on their heels, and what's the cost of the battle for New York City... and the life of Anya Corazon? 32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
